long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StellarTick is a lightweight, live Stellar XLM price ticker, calculator, and market stats app. The goal is to provide you with the quickest method of access to view the latest XLM price and calculate the worth of your holdings. StellarTick supports multiple Fiat currencies and gets its price and market data via CryptoCompare.com.
